price: Edhe sikur t’ju lirojmë nga dënimi pak (kohë), ju me siguri që do të ktheheni (në mosbesim).
arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابِ قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ عَآئِدُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: innā kāshifū al-ʿadhābi qalīlan innakum ʿāidūna
